replies.body: Rito, I would have uninstalled if that poro died.
But he didn't, and that's the most important part <3
Obviously because he is the next champion
This is categorized under "Champion Preview," so...or maybe Riot's just trolling... Hope not!

the poro is its own champion, maybe the poro king. it could have a passive where nuetral monsters would never finish it off, only reduce health. for a q, it could restore health by eating a poro snack. for a w, it could summon a mini poro to attack enemies. for the e, it could lick enemies to stun/slow them. for the ult, it would send out an army of poros to frenzy and attack any enemies that come too close to the poro king. it must be done. now... please.

rito just make his name angus and not braum......
